Description.Name: Signal Severed
Description.Details: Shortly after departure from Eagle Rest II, a priority message pings your terminal—encrypted with Ghost Bear Watch protocols. “Good work. Uplink neutralized, signal net disrupted. Proceed to next priority site: Butzfleth Majoris.Target data will be transmitted upon arrival. —Jorgensson” No sign-off. No elaboration. Just another set of coordinates, pulsing cold on the navscreen. Time to move.

Description.Name: Prepare to leave for Butzfleth
Description.Details: Farah walks onto the bridge, holding out her datapad with a frown. “Report just came in on Butzfleth Majoris, Commander. It’s a large Periphery world—dry as a bone with a thin, toxic atmosphere. Terrain’s mostly cracked basins, scorched plateaus, and the scattered remains of abandoned mining ops.” She scrolls further, then adds, “The population’s tiny. Practically everyone’s tied to a massive high-security prison complex along the equator. Outside of that, it’s just a few dusty mining enclaves and service shacks clinging to life.” Farah taps the screen again. “Dust storms roll in constantly, and static interference makes off-world comms next to useless. The place isn’t just isolated—it’s cut off. All of that makes it perfect for covert movements or disappearing completely. And something tells me that’s exactly why the Tribe is here.” [A new flashpoint has been created in the Butzfleth system, head there for the contract]
